ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Sister of the Wolf! From what I have noticed, your slam and bash skills are the same, only the bash will use a shield if it is equipped. When you use one
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Sister of the Wolf!

From what I have noticed, your slam and bash skills are
the same, only the bash will use a shield if it is equipped.
When you use one or the other, the same skill (bash)
raises. If you don't have a shield equipped and try using
the bash skill you will get a message saying you need a
shield. The slam will work, however. I am working on my
bash/slam skill now with dual weapons instead of kick
because I have noticed it does interrupt spell casters much
more than kick.

Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem no periisem"

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 8:10 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> What is the difference between Slam and Bash? I have been bashing
> everyone
> like crazy trying to get it up to the same level as my kick, and now I
> find
> out that I might be wasting my time. I am a Barbarian Princess, so
> slamming
> people around is right in my league, but just what is the difference?
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
